name: WinRK Archive
summary: Learn about .RK files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: RK, also known as RK Archiver, and WinRK are archiving programs that were published by RK Software. These programs could save archives in several formats, including their native, proprietary RK format.

WinRK and RK Archiver compress RK files using several different compression algorithms, including PWCM, FPW, ROLZ2, ROLZ3, and others. In some cases, RK files are password-protected, to prevent unauthorized users from opening them.
NOTE: RK Software eventually changed its name to M Software.

instructions: You can open an RK file with WinRK (Windows), which is discontinued but still available online. To do so, select File â†’ Open... from the program's menu bar, and then navigate to and open your RK file.
To extract the files your RK file contains:
Select the Extract button in WinRK's toolbar.
In the Extract Files window, specify the location at which to save your extracted files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
